title: New Rune System - Mana?
body: Mana regen is a joke. Would be nice to have something in the new system to help heavy mana users out.

replies.body:
There are quite a few options in a few diff rune trees for mana. Just try switching things up a bit if you're struggling with resource management.

Some rune options are:
Manaflow Band (Sorc)
Kleptomany (Insp)
Biscuit Delivery (Insp)
Presence of Mind (Prec)

You could also try switching up your builds. There is a decent variety in mana and mana regen items.

I wouldn't really say that Kleptomancy gives you much in terms of MANA regen, and even when it does, it's really not reliable, Manaflow Band however is definitely one that gives you a TON of mana regen.

I had decent success with Kleptomancy for mana, was getting either biscuits or mana pots reasonably regularly, but it is a fair point to say it's unreliable, I wouldn't use it on it's own for mana unless you don't need all that much extra early.
Or you could learn Mana conservation...
